ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.subtitle: The journey from a small corner in Saigon to building a human-centered AI platform shaped by Vietnamese spirit.
ourStory.p1: HYPER ONE began in a modest room at 68 Nguyen Hue, Ben Nghe, District 1 — now Saigon Ward, Ho Chi Minh City. Five people, a few desks, and one shared belief: AI exists to empower people, not replace them.
ourStory.p2: There was no glamorous launch and no overnight success. Only long working days, intense discussions, and one question repeated over and over: what should AI truly do for Vietnamese businesses and Vietnamese people?
ourStory.p3: We believe AI must solve real problems. It must help businesses operate better, help Vietnamese people access knowledge more easily, and free humans to focus on meaningful work. That is why HYPER ONE built its ecosystem piece by piece — HYPER BOT, HYPER ME, HYPER CLOUD, HYPER LAB — each crafted with patience and intention.
ourStory.p4: Another question guides us: can Vietnamese products go global? The answer is yes — if we build with ethics, excellence, and persistence. Vietnam is home to smart, adaptable, and resilient people. If the value is real, the world will embrace it.
ourStory.p5: The world may see Vietnam in many ways, but three traits are undeniable: we learn fast, we work hard, and we stay humble. This is the spirit HYPER ONE follows. We don’t chase trends; we choose to move steadily, intentionally, and genuinely.
ourStory.p6: From a small room and a small team, we continue building a Vietnamese AI platform that is simple, resilient, and human-centered. This is not yet a success story — it is only the beginning of a long journey.
ourStory.quote: Not what AI can do, but what AI should do.

compliance.title: International Compliance Standards
compliance.description: Hyper One adheres to four globally recognized ISO/IEC standards for privacy, cloud security, personal data protection, and responsible AI governance.

29100.title: ISO/IEC 29100 – Privacy Framework
29100.description: Defines 11 internationally accepted privacy principles forming a structured foundation for personal data protection.

keyPoints.scope: Applicable across the entire data ecosystem

27017.title: ISO/IEC 27017 – Cloud Security Guidelines
27017.description: Provides security controls and practical deployment guidance for cloud providers and customers.

27018.title: ISO/IEC 27018 – Protection of PII in Cloud
27018.description: Focuses on safeguarding personally identifiable information (PII) following international best practices.

27557.title: ISO/IEC 27557 – Responsible AI Governance
27557.description: Establishes principles for transparent, trustworthy, and accountable AI systems aligned with ethical global standards.
